thread.title: Sapthami Gowda Shares Inspirational Workout Video, Says 'My Body And Coach Never Give Up On Me'
thread.title_full: Sapthami Gowda Shares Inspirational Workout Video, Says 'My Body And Coach Never Give Up On Me'

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Sapthami Gowda Shares Inspirational Workout Video, Says 'My Body And Coach Never Give Up On Me'
text:
Her recent workout video in a gym is a testament to the same. The Kannada film star shared a video where it was seen that she is going through intense training, showcasing her commitment towards staying fit.
Sharing the video on the social media platform Instagram she wrote, "It is hard, it is difficult and I do get tired. But, I'll do it all over again. What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Getting through a session is always hard but the aftermath of it is something that I absolutely love. I am irregular at times. But, both my body and my coach don't ever give up on me. Thanks to both of them. My coach and I have completely changed my routine now and I'm loving what I see. The only thing that sticks with me after a workout is my coach @prashanth3488 sir always asking me to breathe. Just like in life, BREATHE."
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Sapthami Gowda ðŸ§¿ (@sapthami_gowda)
\n Sapthami's workout video has sparked curiosity among the netizens. Some controversies have sparked stating that she could be spotted in the role of a police officer or she may be preparing for an action film. She hasn't yet announced anything yet about her upcoming works.
Sapthami Gowda was first seen on the big screen in the Kannada action crime film Popcorn Monkey Tiger in 2020, directed by Duniya Soori and produced by KM Sudhir. She also acted in notable movies like Kantara, Kantara A Legend: Chapter 1 and Yuva.
The 27-year-old actress earlier showed an example of her commendable acting skills in Kantara, which gave her much-deserved recognition. She also acted in the Bollywood film The Vaccine War, directed by Vivek Agnihotri, which added another feather under her cap.
